Yes, I realize it is the only one but that doesn't change the rating.

-Has awful video quality on every level (pixels, blurry, dark..etc)
-Has extremely bad audio (low, muffled, sounds like it's underwater)
-Has really annoying asian subtitles at the bottom in a huge font.

Don't watch it on a TV, use your laptop or phone or iPod or something smaller or else it's not watchable
